paper_abstract: We present a contraction-free sequent calculus for the modal logic S4 such that all the rules are decreasing and enjoy the subformula property. We also introduce a refutation calculus with the same properties of . We provide a proof search algorithm that, given a sequent sigma, returns either a proof of sigma in or a refutation of sigma in . From a refutation of sigma, we can generate an S4-model of sigma.
paper_title: Terminating sequent calculi for proving and refuting formulas in S4
